website_summaries.verdict: Other cameras may deliver better image quality and performance, but none can survive the range of conditions that the Olympus 1030 SW was designed for.
pros: Rugged, sealed body that's waterproof, crushproof, shockproof, and freezeproof
solid build and design, onboard Guide for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I love Olympus waterproof cameras, but this camera was not waterproof. It was not even put underwater and the screen fogged up and moisture got in the camera. If bought new this is a good camera, but I purchased a used one and it was crap. It was already messed up before it ever arrived. I have owned many Olympus cameras for years and I love them. I have even owned this one but after a few years it gave out. This one was already out, but it's condition was "used-good" it was good as long as it was not around moisture.
customer_reviews.author: bandball

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera on dozen of kayak-trips, dangling from its lanyard on my life-vest, since I bought it in 2008 and it has not shown any weaknesses. Never any issues with water-leakage or from rough care. I also find battery-life to be good. The reason I give it a four rather than a five is due to picture quality; due to pixels and a somewhat weaker lens than my Canon 11 I sometimes wish for more pixels. But for the price it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Runar

customer_reviews.title: It still works great. I lost the glass cover on the lens ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera for so long now, I can't even remember when I made this purchase. Believe it or not it is still alive and well. It has been dropped countless times on hard surfaces, water, snow, etc. It still works great. I lost the glass cover on the lens which is a bummer and this is out of warranty but it still works without the glass. :)
customer_reviews.author: BuffaloShopper

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the model appears to be a good model camera
customer_reviews.text: I received an incomplete camera. The sleeve for the Microchip was not included and a camera shop owner told me they have not been produced for many years. I have been unable to purchase one online so far, but I am still looking for one. One of the two batteries advertised as part of the deal was dead and could not be recharged at all. I am still hoping I can get the camera fully operational, but I regret purchasing this camera on Amazon. Otherwise the model appears to be a good model camera, sturdy and with options comparable to cameras I already own in the $300 range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this "rugged" camera...
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews before buying it about it getting water in it. I still bought it. I had it in my hand as I was swimming in a river. I climbed on to a rock to take some photos but every time I turned it on, it kept telling my battery door was open. It wasn't open. I triple checked. Not until I saw the water creeping into the screen that I knew it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: Nitwit

customer_reviews.title: Best in it's class
customer_reviews.text: I researched all the point and shoot cameras and found the Olympus Stylus 1030SW has the most to offer for the money. Besides the obvious features no other cameras can match like the Water Proof, Crush proof and so on is the overall quality of the camera. It looks and feels very well made. The pictures are sharp and clear and the menu and buttons are easy to understand and operate. One of the truely best point and shoot cameras out there.
customer_reviews.author: Robotech4ncc

customer_reviews.title: You Can Use More Than 2GB Memory Cards
customer_reviews.text: I just received the camera, bought together with the 2GB XD memory card because someone said that 2GB was all the camera could support. Wrong. The version 1.1 camera firmware update, already installed on my camera when it arrived (no need to have it downloaded with the Olympus Master 2 software - although there is an update available for that as well), allows support of memory cards greater than 2GB. The camera comes with an adapter to convert microSDHC cards (8 GB for example) to the XD format needed for the camera. I was impressed with the ease of navigation through the camera settings using only one hand to hold and navigate at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott in LA

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: This camera leaked on me three times. I kept sending it back to Olympus and they would "fix" it rather than replace it. After the third time they replaced it (but not the memory card that was ruined).I never abused the camera, never took it deep in the water. It just seems like its not very waterproof. When it works, it is a beautiful camera, takes great pictures, and is easy to use. This may be better suited to someone who will not submerge the camera, which was what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera but lacks...
customer_reviews.text: We took this camera to Puerto Vallarta last August. It did really well with pictures taken on the outside. The underwater pictures were great too. The only problem I have with this camera is the fact that when in movie recording mode, you can't zoom. This is the second Olympus camera I've owned and love the ease of use. But aside from this minor issue, I would say this is as good a product as my older Olympus.
customer_reviews.author: M A González

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Stylus 1030sw
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I purchased it right before a Curacao vacation and didn't have too much time to figure it out beforehand. I found that it was easy to figure out with a little help from the book. At first I was afraid to taake it underwater but then I took the plunge! The pictures came out wonderful. We were snorkeling and the colors of the fish came out true. You need to watch were you place your fingers beause it's easy to put over the lens. I would recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: T. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera if you want/need a waterproof/shockproof camera. The image quality for pictures taken outdoors is great. But it is really not good for indoor pictures with high ISOs, the pictures becomes extremely pixelated and grainy. I wish they had used a better processor for higher ISO pictures. But if waterproof is the ultimate goal this is definitely the way to go. I took some great pictures underwater and outdoors in general. Nice size and robust built. High recommend for its purpose but if artistic/great shots is your goal, go for a DSLR. This is a bit pricey too, and I got it because I broke my last two cameras because of water spills.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Descent but not great
customer_reviews.text: I like that this camera is water proof and shock proof so I don't have to worry too much about it at the beach, lake or snowy areas. However, this camera takes mediocre pictures. My previous camera prior to this one was a Canon PowerShot S50 at 5MP and the Canon simply blows this Olympus away in terms of picture quality even at half the resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera with the hope that it would still have the ability to remain waterproof to some extent. I used it one day and it got wet, but I did not keep it submerged for long or go deeper then a couple of feet. The camera flooded and I had to dry it out and now know that I cannot rely on it being water proof at all. Since it was only $50 I cannot say that I can complain too much, but wish I had known before using it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera bad paint
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. Good battery life very good pictures, a little slow, but good enough for family vaca stuff. It's incredible underwater, jsut to be able to go in and out like that is phenomenal. I go from beaches to the desert and everywhere in between and this thing is great. One con is the finish. I bought the black one and the paint just wiped off after one trip to the ocean. It is basically the stainless model with just a little paint on the outside. Not really a big deal. But it isnt black anymore.
customer_reviews.author: S. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Picture this
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a good camera for on the go. Not the best but certainly not a loser. the photo quality at distance is not great but for everyday use is fine. In order to take video segments that are more than 10 seconds you need to buy the more expensive m+ card (which are not very fast) and download a patch that allow this camera to take long video segments.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent features, ok photos
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera I couldn't break with my persistent clumsiness and bought this one on the recommendation of two friends. I'm very pleased with its durability and general ease of use. I'm not very techno-savvy, though, so a lot of my pictures in low light come out really fuzzy. It might just be that I have it on some of the wrong settings, but it seems to me that I got better low-light pictures from my previous camera, which I broke by dropping too many times. But I'm willing to concede that the problem might be me, not the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for underwater and travel. It is very easy to use, it takes good pictures and it truly is waterproof, drop-proof, crush-proof and so much more! The only issue I had with it was drying the lens off after taking it out of the water when I wanted to take an above water picture. Otherwise, I love it! It certainly serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: k-girl

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Stylus 1030 SW is great
customer_reviews.text: We went to BurningMan this summer and the dust destroyed my Minolta digital camera. I searched for something dust proof, water proof, shock proof and the Olympus was the answer. After it arrived it took very few minutes to read instructions and began taking excellent pictures. I look forward to another week on the Playa with a camera that will take the abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera in July of 09 and love it. It takes great pictures and also takes abuse with no complaints. So far this camera has been shot with a sim munition (small dent), dropped in the Chicago river, been skiing in Canada (-40 F) and gone SCUBA diving in the Gulf of Mexico. I would recommend the "float" style wrist strap for water activities and the silicon cover to keep all the compartments closed.
customer_reviews.author: Will Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for those a little less than careful...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and I also bought one for my boyfriend, they both have exclaimed it was their favorite Christmas gift. It's durable, sleek, and lightweight. It does not give away the fact that it is - for all accidental occurences - virtually indestructible. The options for taking different types of pictures are numerous, but if you are able to take good care of your camera, you don't really need to add the option that makes it able to endure 220lbs of force. The zoom option is also not too significant, if you really like taking close-ups from far away, I suggest a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Media Addict

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's waterproof, but very marginal picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Well, I wanted this to be the camera that could do it all. I have an old Canon S40 with a UW housing that takes excellent quality pictures - great optics for a point and shoot - but the old Canon is a bit heavy for my shirt pocket and very bulky with the UW housing. Unfortunately, this Olympus 10mp camera takes poorer quality pictures than my old 4mp Canon S40, with or without the UW housing on. Bright sunny day pics turn out acceptably on the Olympus, but any other lighting conditions result in dull, washed out looking, somewhat grainy pictures. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: jeff k

customer_reviews.title: Not always waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera at a friend's recommendation in advance of a cruise vacation. I looked forward to using the waterproof feature. I carefully read the directions and followed them -- but when I used the camera underwater (not more than a foot underwater), the camera stopped working. I was extremely disappointed that a brand new camera was ruined, and that I did not then have a camera available for the rest of my trip. The friend that recommended the camera to me travelled with me on the same trip, and was successful in using her camera underwater -- but apparently there is some inconsistency in production of this camera that makes it less than completely reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Maybe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent versatile and durable
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the perfect all around camera with better than average image quality, durable housing, simple controls with the right depth of complexity for customizable images with great battery life. We took our camera on a cruise - this camera was perfect. Underwater, bouncing off the ground and then taking great shots moments thereafter ..could you ask for anything more?
customer_reviews.author: T. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera, great photos.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera when it was new. My original one lasted about 10 years. This was a replacement when mine took on water and wan no longer reparable by OLympus since it was so old.
customer_reviews.author: LadyKathy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this camera if you are planning to use it underwater. I used it for two days while snorkeling and the camera shut down and I was not able to use it for the rest of our vacation. The frame around the shutter fell off and all the black paint on the front of the camera came off. I sent it to Olympus and they sent it back painted with the metal frame glued back on, but they never addressed the waterproof issue. The camera is a great idea, but the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best Olympus Stylus yet
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few stylus over the years due to their durability. This one is the new and best yet even offering 3.6x Wide Angle Zoom and a much nicer image quality then past models of the camera. Feels like a tank, have little fear of damaging on adventures do to crush proof features. Just plan a lot of fun to use to.
customer_reviews.author: Eric BVD

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Pictures turn out to bright, with to much glare in the pictures. Had someone who knows a lot about cameras check her out and they said the brightness could not fixed. They tried to fix the exposure settings and they did not work, nothing we do helps. Tried playing with the shadow adjustment mode but it does not make a difference, every picture you take infront of something has your shadow and it looks like your head is disfigured. Although I had no problems with it leaking, i think it takes better pictures underwater than on land! I do not recommend this camera, to much money to spend on a camera with these kind of flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson E. Higgs

customer_reviews.title: This has been a very good camera for me
customer_reviews.text: This has been a very good camera for me. I am a whitewater kayaker and this camera has taken a lot of great pictures for me. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Bought It and Returned It in Less Than a Week
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations of this camera due to the price. I loved the solid build and tough box construction. But the photos disappointed me over and over again. I have bought Canon Elph Powershot cameras for over (5) years because they take unbelievable, high quality photographs. Long story short - I returned it and purchased a 10 megapixel Canon at Sam's Club. The other issue is that X-D cards are expensive and not always compatible with universal card readers, especially on laptop computers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: 1030 SW great idea, failed after a week of heavy use
customer_reviews.text: I used my 1030 SW as backup for a digital SLR during a once in a lifetime cruise through the Galapagos. Picture quality good for P&S; after 4 one hour trips in the water, the camera failed. It turned on and off, but would not take pictures and the LCD screen did not work. I am sending it back for replacement. Its a great idea for a go anywhere do anything camera, but it did not stand up to what I consider minor water exposure. Others have had better experience, but I had not warning of potential crash.
customer_reviews.author: James Kirchhoffer

customer_reviews.title: I got totally duped by Olympus marketing
customer_reviews.text: None of the features panned out the way I expected. WATER USE: Yes, it's waterproof, but it doesn't help if it takes terrible underwater pictures. Even if you could maneuver the non-user friendly settings/options, there is no way you can get the lighting and speed right. All my pix came out blurry or discolored. I would have been better off with a disposable camera. LAND USE: I liked the idea of having a drop-proof sturdy camera, but unfortunately it could not take decent land pictures :( They were pretty low quality...smartphones take better pix than this.
customer_reviews.author: oops

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - the 3rd one we've purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these for my company and one for personal use. I'm considering another for personal... it is an excellent camera with outstanding durability. On top of it all, it takes beautiful, clear, crisp pictures withOUT a delay! Only my very expensive DSLR is faster, but not by much!! A must have for everyone who enjoys photography, but wants to have something they can take anywhere, regardless of the weather, and fit it in their pocket or purse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera was recommended to me by daughter who loved her similar Olympus camera. this camera has surpassed my expectations. I was very happy with my Canon digital camera but as we spend a lot on time in our boat and love snorkeling this water proof camera intriged us...we Love it. Wonderful clear pictures and very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Mite

customer_reviews.title: Olympus 1030SW-Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Thing i like about this camera: Waterproof, tough, shiny, wide angle zoom. The picture quality is great after you get used to with difference the settings and shooting modes. Drawbacks; LCD not as sharp and clear as Canon powershots, and its not made in Japan... I think Olympus 1030SW is the best waterproof, shockproof camera atm.
customer_reviews.author: KaiZen

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre and dislike the proprietary cable and XDcard
customer_reviews.text: I loved the ruggedness of this camera but the lens is not good for land based pics. Underwater pics are great. I really dislike the fact that Olympus is trying to make an extra buck by having a proprietary cable connector rather than a mini usb and they have joined the club with Sony on the proprietary memory card. I am stuck with my pictures on the memory card because my two card readers do not have an XD slot and my cable is at work. They should have used an SD memory card.
customer_reviews.author: James Cornes

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This Camera takes excellent pictures for something that fits in your pocket. Always handy, it provides a means to capture those shots that would get away if you had to drag around a big Camera. The Macro also works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Bracale

customer_reviews.title: bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Im sure the normal camera is good but I but a barely functioning one refurbished and had to twist arms to get a full refund took me months to get my money back. One of the worst amazon experiences ever.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: ... now for about 4 years and it's been a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera now for about 4 years and it's been a great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Still like this better than the models that came after (until this year's, 2013 where they moved the shutter to the camera center). Easy to use and great pics.
customer_reviews.author: etapi65

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and would not hesitate ordering this again, if I ever needed replace it!
customer_reviews.author: bka0721

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is indestructible. It's my go-to camera that stays in my bag for disaster deployments.
customer_reviews.author: Bull 30290

customer_reviews.title: Defect in the Olympus Stylus 1030sw
customer_reviews.text: The Olympus Stylus 1030SW has been shipping with a known defect by Olympus. In the video recording mode the sound track contains a popping sound. It is generated by any touching of the camera. Olympus is supposedly coming out with a firmware fix in September. The buyer should beware of this problem and perhaps wait to purchase until a fix is incorporated in the cameras.
customer_reviews.author: G. Appell

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Stylus 1030SW
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I purchased this for a trip my wife was going on and she loves it. It takes great pictures and completely lives up to the product description in terms of toughness. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C. Young

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I already have one and am pretty good with using it ; problem ? I have two harleys and one camera ..... so am always forgetting the camera. Solution find and purchase a 5 year old camera in good shape ....found one from Hawaii used once ?!?!?!?!?!? I know, but it's just as advertised , steal of the century , now each bike has a camera in its pouches........ Now to remember about keeping batteries charged ...........
customer_reviews.author: David H. Butters

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely careful with this camera and never had it in more than a foot of water and it still leaked when it was only a couple days old. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: TRLK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera - The Waterproof Part is THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Olympus 1030SW - it matches my lifestyle... rough, tough & ready for anything, especially water. Shot a short video of me jumping in a lake, which obviously doesnt phase the camera whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ruschke

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: One of my best purchases online EVER! This camera has been through it all. Heat, snow, underwater, clubs, pubs, surfing, water glasses, beer glasses (cool party trick), baby pictures, parades and more! The quality on low-lighting is not picture perfect, but I plan to get an SLR one day for that.
customer_reviews.author: William Tell

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Olympus Stylus 1030 SW I've purchased in the last year for myself and family members. We have had no problems with this camera at all and buying through Amazon is absolutely the way to go. The only negative feature with this camera is very, very low volumn when you use the video side of the camera and Olympus is aware of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Was the last Olympus camera I bought
customer_reviews.text: The quality sucked and the seal went during a trip in the Caribbeans. Didn't even get to use it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: TRickman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I loved this, but after awhile the shutter stopped opening. I took a few pictures under water, but I don't really need an underwater camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Vacation Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am aware that the reviews rate this camera inferior to others. However, if you want a camera that you can use anywhere, this is the camera for you. it take great underwater movies and I am quite satisfied with the Quality of almost all the shots I took. I took pictures in the water of a tow banana boat that I could not let go of more than one hand and they turned out great. Of course I didn't know that until after the ride.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Unruh

customer_reviews.title: Flawed
customer_reviews.text: The screen stopped working before a dozen pictures were taken. The warranty does not cover the shipping. Very expensive and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera and used it for several day kayaking trips. NEVER dropped it, NEVER submerged it, ALWAYS was careful. I am a part time photographer. Last week I tried the camera and it would not power up. Changed batteries, etc. DEAD CAMERA. Emailed Olympus. Still waiting to hear from them. What a waste of $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Biker

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Received camera the same week as ordered. Takes great photo's and is water proof. Already fell into a punch bowl and washed up great.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything they say it is! Worked great, takes exceptional wide pics; I use it for taking pics of my jobsites and homes that I am estimating. I can typically fit in the entire house in one shot. Built very well; a bit heavy, but worth it!! Best value for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh T. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Failed Water Test
customer_reviews.text: Although the pictures were very good and was easy to use, it leaked when I used it underwater. Not very nice when you go to Hawaii and it dies with your first dip!
customer_reviews.author: DufferAT

customer_reviews.title: This camera does it all
customer_reviews.text: and is easy to use...great user interface. Underwater movies with sound is a cool feature. Just when you think you have all the features you need, you read the instructions and find that there are many more that are easily mastered and a lot of fun. Get the floating wrist strap and take it on a snorkeling trip.
customer_reviews.author: bobbert

customer_reviews.title: a great camera
customer_reviews.text: the pictures are great in the water and in normal but not to good on the dark its normal in the dark but the zoonm is short but the quality its great
customer_reviews.author: miguel velazco

customer_reviews.title: Best camera in its class
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked waterproof cameras, but this one takes it to a new level! Don't have to worry about others taking pictures with it because they couldn't break it even if they tried! Good quality, decent features, and super strong. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: W. French

customer_reviews.title: Many nice features
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product overall. I think it has some great features and takes nice pictures. I haven't used it underwater yet but will be in a couple of weeks. My only complaint is the zoom is not that impressive. My previous point and shoot camera's have had a much better zoom. But I'm still happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Peligri

customer_reviews.title: Olyumpus Digital Camera 1030 SW
customer_reviews.text: The reference camera is excellent. My wife has the older version, 720 SW, and this is improved and more rugged for my clumsey hands. The zoom lens never extends beyond the plane of the case so there is no chance of damage if dropped like my last camera. It is easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Anastasi

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working the first time it went into the water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my brother and he said it stopped working the first time he took it into the water. This might be a defective build but there seems to be plenty of people that had similar problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: This works great. It's small enough for me to put in my purse. The pictures are great. The one down feature is the sound when making a recording it doesn't pick up enough.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD BURK

customer_reviews.title: great camera!
customer_reviews.text: very good camera! rivals my nikon d80 shots! great for beach pictures and when raining/drizzling outside! This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera and works great underwater
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. Great underwater shots including video. I Highly recommend this camera if you are in and around water on a vacation or have a pool at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera all the time. i actualy have two and two suction cup mounts for it. goes anywhere i do and it can take the hits.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Stylus 1030sw
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, you can use it everywhere, the quality of the pictures has improve a lot from the latest model.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Took camera on a month long trip to Central and South America and it performed wonderfully. I used it many times under water and the pictures came out really good. I also "bumped" it a few times and since it is shock-proof, no harm done. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: we bought this camera for several reasons ..grandkids who have to play with everything, size and picture quality not to mention ease of use..it answers the bell in every catagory and is all but indestructable..
customer_reviews.author: marine8653

customer_reviews.title: I Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a take anywhere camera. It can take a little abuse, being dropped, or what, and still keep going. Under water is no problem with these cameras.
customer_reviews.author: midst

customer_reviews.title: One Tough Cookie
customer_reviews.text: This camera is laden with features and takes great pictures but not perfect pictures. What cinched the deal for me was its sturdiness of build quality. That being first rate.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fracaro

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Very versitile, easy to use, and up for any adventure. Dropped it off a roof the other day, not a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Olympus 1030 SW - update
customer_reviews.text: Bought as replacement for old Konica-Minolta Dimage Xg (broken display). So far happy of this optimized purchase when looking for sleek design and increased protection level. Optical viewfinder + manual focusing function would make this camera perfect = having everything I need. Update: After 5 years of heavy use display start malfunctioning (turns negative and blurry).Beside that 1030 SW is hard to kill .
customer_reviews.author: Jerzy Umiastowski

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Olympus 1030 that I purchased so I must be satisfied with it. I bought the first one last year and used it on vacation in the carribean. All the pictures were perfect and with it being waterproof, we used it snorkeling and got some great shots. It's so small and lightweight you can take it anywhere and it really is shock proof. Time for a graduation gift and this seemed like the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: GMT.

customer_reviews.title: Present for the wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife has the habit of sitting on cameras and cell phones or putting them through the washer. I bought this camera for that reason. She loves the camera. It does great macros of her flowers and great all around shots. It is the first electronic item that she has found easy to operate. For what I bought it for is gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the low price, but the camera arrived promptly with no flaws. I'm very impressed with the seller. Thanks for the fabulous camera and quick service!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: The best camera EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera!!! Water proof and easy to use!! I have had two to date one was stollen and I had to have another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I took this out on father's day. I used it to take some surfing pictures in the ocean and some wine tasting pictures in Temecula and all turned out great. It's very easy to use and I really like the casing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Corner

customer_reviews.title: F@#$KEN  GREAT
customer_reviews.text: ALL I CAN SAY TO THE PEOPLE WHO MAYBE BEEN THIKING ABOUT BUYING A CAMERA DON'T BUY THIS ONE IT'S F*^%$KEN GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Michael houtZ

customer_reviews.title: Worst service by merchant
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a green camera but the merchant Amazon assigned shipped me a silver one. Reason? They didn't have one. They asked me to return it for credit but by that time I needed a camera. Now I am stuck with a camera I did not want. Just bad people.
customer_reviews.author: S. Koo

product_meta.title: Olympus Stylus 1030SW 10.1MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Optical Wide Angle Zoom (Green)
product_meta.description: Color:GreenScuba divers, mountain climbers and adventurers worldwide will love the 10.1-megapixel Stylus 1030 SW, the toughest point-and-shoot camera in the world. This shockproof, waterproof, freezeproof, crushproof and dustproof model builds on the Olympus Stylus SW series’ reputation of delivering amazing images while enduring extreme expeditions and everyday adventures, including life with kids. Even more durable than its predecessors -- it can withstand a drop from 6.6 feet -- the camera has also been pumping up its power with a 3.6x wide-angle optical zoom, 2.7-inch LCD screen and digital imaging advances, including Face Detection, Shadow Adjustment Technology, and a TruePic III image processor to capture rich, vibrant detail with every shot.
feature_bullets: 10-megapixel image sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
Waterproof to 33 feet; shockproof to 6.6 feet
Stores images on xD Picture Cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars281 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
